verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> you <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> but do not <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> but do not <S%H8085>hear;<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"Therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for yourself <S%H3627>baggage<s%> for <S%H1473>exile<s%> and <S%H1540>go<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight;<s%> even <S%H1540>go<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%> <S%H194>Perhaps<s%> they will <S%H7200>understand<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"And <S%H3318>bring<s%> your <S%H3627>baggage<s%> out by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as <S%H3627>baggage<s%> for <S%H1473>exile.<s%> Then you will <S%H3318>go<s%> out at <S%H6153>evening<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as those <S%H4161>going<s%> into <S%H1473>exile.<s%>
<S%H2864>"Dig<s%> a hole through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out through it.

<S%H5375>"Load<s%> [the baggage] on [your] <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> [and] <S%H3318>carry<s%> [it] out in the <S%H5939>dark.<s%> You shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> so that you can not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> for I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you as a <S%H4159>sign<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

And I <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> as I had been <S%H6680>commanded.<s%> By <S%H3119>day<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> out my <S%H3627>baggage<s%> like the <S%H3627>baggage<s%> of an <S%H1473>exile.<s%> Then in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> I <S%H2864>dug<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with my <S%H3027>hands;<s%> I <S%H3318>went<s%> out in the <S%H5939>dark<s%> [and] <S%H5375>carried<s%> [the baggage] on [my] <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> has not the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H4100>'What<s%> are you <S%H6213>doing<s%>?'

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H9294>burden<s%> [concerns] the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> as well as <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in it. "'

<S%H559>"Say,<s%> 'I am a <S%H4159>sign<s%> to you. As I have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> it will be <S%H6213>done<s%> to them; they will <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H1473>exile,<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>'

"And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> them will <S%H5375>load<s%> [his baggage] on [his] <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in the <S%H5939>dark<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out. They will <S%H2864>dig<s%> a hole through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> [it] out. He will <S%H3680>cover<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3282>so<s%> <S%H834><s%> that he can not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with [his] <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

"I shall also <S%H6566>spread<s%> My <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him, and he will be <S%H8610>caught<s%> in My <S%H9287>snare.<s%> And I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> yet he will not <S%H7200>see<s%> it, though he will <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> him, his <S%H5828>helpers<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>troops;<s%> and I shall <S%H9553>draw<s%> out a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.
"So they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> when I <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2219>spread<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

"But I shall <S%H3498>spare<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> of them from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> that they may <S%H5608>tell<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H935>go,<s%> and may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
Moreover, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H7494>trembling,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H7269>quivering<s%> and <S%H1674>anxiety.<s%>

"Then <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> concerning the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" They will <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H1674>anxiety<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H8078>horror,<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H3456>stripped<s%> of its <S%H4393>fulness<s%> on <S%H6440>account<s%> of the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in it.

"And the <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> will be <S%H2717>laid<s%> <S%H2717>waste,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> will be a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%> So you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"' "
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> you [people] have <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H748>long<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> fails'?

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will make <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> so that they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H9301>use<s%> it as a <S%H9301>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> "But <S%H1696>tell<s%> them, "The <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> as well as the <S%H1697>fulfillment<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2377>vision.<s%>

"For there will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> or <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"For I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H834>whatever<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> I <S%H1696>speak<s%> will be <S%H6213>performed.<s%> It will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H4900>delayed,<s%> for in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> O <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> and <S%H6213>perform<s%> it," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>' "
Furthermore, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H2377>vision<s%> that he <S%H2372>sees<s%> is for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>years<s%> [from now,] and he <S%H5012>prophesies<s%> of <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H7350>off.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3808>"None<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of My <S%H1697>words<s%> will be <S%H4900>delayed<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer.<s%> <S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> I <S%H1696>speak<s%> will be <S%H6213>performed,<s%>"'" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
